name: Onboarding Password Reset
description: Sent to a user to prompt them to set their first IdentityNow password.
subject: Set your first ${PRODUCT_NAME} password
body:
Dear ${userDisplayName},

Welcome to ${PRODUCT_NAME}! To get started, you need to set your ${PRODUCT_NAME} password.

Your username is ${userName}. Click here to set your password.

If clicking the link doesn't work, copy and paste the following into your browser:

${verificationURL}

This link expires after ${expirationTime} hours.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
